title: Allows connecting to the service anonymously over Tor, and operates a Tor exit enclave

tosdr.tldr: The DuckDuckGo privacy policy states: "Finally, if you want to prevent sites from knowing you visited them at all, you can use a proxy like Tor. DuckDuckGo actually operates a Tor exit enclave, which means you can get end to end anonymous and encrypted searching using Tor & DDG together."
